metadata.name: Bling 4 Charity
metadata.description:
"Bling 4 Charity" is a project focused on donating money to the people that are facing hunger in Brazil. 100% of the money made will be donated to "Ação da Cidadania", a 30 year old brazilian charity.

After the Covid-19 pandemic, data shows that over 33 million brazilians don't have enough to eat, that is 15% of the country. By buying 1 unit of "Bling 4 Charity" it is possible to provide 360 meals to the ones in need.

link to the organization: https://www.acaodacidadania.org.br/
